<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

This file declares the C API endpoints for generating DWARF Debug Info.

Note: This interface is experimental. It is <em>NOT</em> stable, and may be changed without warning.

<SectionDefinition>

</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMDIBuilderCreateArrayType() {#gab3c5243ec4c41efdde6efd665f31c2a9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMMetadataRef LLVMDIBuilderCreateArrayType (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gae7276221889549b4cf3b3f2297a8333e">LLVMDIBuilderRef</a> Builder, uint64&#95;t Size, uint32&#95;t AlignInBits, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab9f52d9777af781812e7bffdd491d01e">LLVMMetadataRef</a> Ty, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab9f52d9777af781812e7bffdd491d01e">LLVMMetadataRef</a> &#42; Subscripts, unsigned NumSubscripts)</>}>

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Builder">The DIBuilder.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">Array size.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="AlignInBits">Alignment.</ParametersListItem>

### LLVMStripModuleDebugInfo() {#gac86aed2f5553740f151cb1905d4718ee}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMBool LLVMStripModuleDebugInfo (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> Module)</>}>
Strip debug info in the module if it exists.

To do this, we remove all calls to the debugger intrinsics and any named metadata for debugging. We also remove debug locations for instructions. Return true if module is modified.

### LLVMTemporaryMDNode() {#ga68d0a34a31a878cc0452697bebf63e1f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMMetadataRef LLVMTemporaryMDNode (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga9c43e01525516ff6b4feab5166c5b1da">LLVMContextRef</a> Ctx, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab9f52d9777af781812e7bffdd491d01e">LLVMMetadataRef</a> &#42; Data, size&#95;t NumElements)</>}>
Create a new temporary <code>MDNode</code>.

Suitable for use in constructing cyclic <code>MDNode</code> structures. A temporary <code>MDNode</code> is not uniqued, may be RAUW&#39;d, and must be manually deleted with <code>LLVMDisposeTemporaryMDNode</code>. 
<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Ctx">The context in which to construct the temporary node.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Data">The metadata elements.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="NumElements">Number of metadata elements.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
